1117550.name: DJMAX RESPECT V - EXCLUSIVE GEAR PACK
1117550.description:
If you purchase this product, you can play game with new note and gear.
Please check following contents.

1. DJMAX RESPECT V - EXCLUSIVE GEAR -
Have fun with this exclusive EXCLUSIVE GEAR.
When the Fever is activated,
you can enjoy the cool animations of the main characters "EL CLEAR" and "EL FAIL" of DJMAX RESPECT V at the bottom of the gear.

2. DJMAX RESPECT V - EXCLUSIVE NOTE -
EXCLUSIVE GEAR's sensibility is also included in NOTE.
The luxurious golden design and cool effects give you a more dynamic performance.

3. DJMAX RESPECT V - EXCLUSIVE PLATE -
Own a special plate that is only available to customers who have purchased EXCLUSIVE GEAR PACK.
Show off your speciality with EXCLUSIVE PLATE.
1117550.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
